title: The Adventures of Bentley Hippo: Inspiring Children to be Kind
description: (Second edition launching Fall 2022)What happens when the bully becomes the victim?Bentley witnesses his friend Toby being bullied on the bus ride to the fair.As the class arrives at the Fair and the bus stops, Toby's glasses are taken from him.As the day goes on and Bentley, Jaxon and the others try to cheer their worried friend up, a cry for help s heard in the distance.Should they go help or continue looking for Toby's glasses?This book addresses a sensitive topic about bullying, and peer pressure all while teaching kindness.
author: Argyro Graphy
